20110129040153.000|20110129040156.000|CC1|ANGELES IS CALIFORNIA'S CENTRAL 
20110129040156.000|20110129040156.000|CC1|VALLEY.

20110129040159.000|20110129040201.000|CC1|VALLEY STATE PRISON.

20110129040446.000|20110129040447.000|CC1|THREE STRIKES STATUTE AND GOT 35

20110129040451.000|20110129040457.000|CC1|BE ELIGIBLE FOR PAROLE IN 2028,

20110129044334.000|20110129044335.000|CC1|ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IN PRISON.  
20110129044335.000|20110129044340.000|CC1|WHITE LIGHTNING AND PRUNO.      
20110129044340.000|20110129044341.000|CC1|BOTH MADE FROM FRUIT AND SUGAR  
20110129044341.000|20110129044343.000|CC1|AND STRAINED THROUGH A PILLOW   
20110129044343.000|20110129044344.000|CC1|CASE                            
20110129044344.000|20110129044347.000|CC1|>> FOR CAN GET YOU DRUNK AND GET
20110129044347.000|20110129044349.000|CC1|YOU RILED UP.

20110129044351.000|20110129044353.000|CC1|WHITE LIGHTNING AND IF THEY ASK 
20110129044353.000|20110129044357.000|CC1|YOU A QUESTION LIKE CAN I SEE

20110129044400.000|20110129044403.000|CC1|TAKE SIX OR SEVEN TO BRING THEM 
20110129044403.000|20110129044404.000|CC1|DOWN.

20110129045433.000|20110129045435.000|CC1|OUT FROM THESE GUYS.            
20110129045435.000|20110129045438.000|CC1|>> WHAT DO I ANTICIPATE?        
20110129045438.000|20110129045438.000|CC1|NOTHING.

20110129045442.000|20110129045443.000|CC1|THERE IS NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT 
20110129045443.000|20110129045444.000|CC1|OR LOOK FORWARD TO.

20110129045445.000|20110129045447.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE FIRST PLACE THEY 
20110129045447.000|20110129045448.000|CC1|SEE WHEN THEY COME IN AND THE   
20110129045448.000|20110129045450.000|CC1|LAST PLACE THEY SEE WHEN THEY   
20110129045450.000|20110129045450.000|CC1|LEAVE.                          
20110129045450.000|20110129045452.000|CC1|WE PROCESS THEM AND RUN MEDICAL 
20110129045452.000|20110129045453.000|CC1|ON THEM.                        
20110129045453.000|20110129045455.000|CC1|THEY GET THE TB SHOTS HERE TO   
20110129045455.000|20110129045457.000|CC1|MAKE SURE THEY ARE NOT          
20110129045457.000|20110129045457.000|CC1|CONTAGIOUS.                     
20110129045457.000|20110129045459.000|CC1|WE TAKE THEIR PHOTOS TO MAKE    
20110129045459.000|20110129045501.000|CC1|SURE THEY DON'T HAVE CONTRABAND.
20110129045501.000|20110129045503.000|CC1|>> PUT THE BOXES IN THAT CARD   
20110129045503.000|20110129045504.000|CC1|RIGHT THERE.                    
20110129045504.000|20110129045508.000|CC1|>> I STARTED GANG BANGING AND   
20110129045508.000|20110129045510.000|CC1|CHANGING MY LIFE.               
20110129045510.000|20110129045511.000|CC1|>> I HOPE IT'S A PROGRAM.       
20110129045511.000|20110129045514.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT IT'S GET TO COME TO.
20110129045514.000|20110129045516.000|CC1|I ANTICIPATE GOING AND DOING MY 
20110129045516.000|20110129045518.000|CC1|FIVE YEARS AND GOING BACK TO THE
20110129045518.000|20110129045518.000|CC1|STREET.                         
20110129045518.000|20110129045524.000|CC1|>> 300 INMATES CAME IN LAST     
20110129045524.000|20110129045524.000|CC1|WEEK.                           
20110129045524.000|20110129045529.000|CC1|ONE DAY 132 OF THEM.

20110129045536.000|20110129045536.000|CC1|>> YOU ARE GOING RIGHT WHERE YOU
20110129045536.000|20110129045541.000|CC1|ARE SUPPOSED TO BE.             
20110129045541.000|20110129045544.000|CC1|>> I NEVER SEEN NO [ BLEEP ]    
20110129045544.000|20110129045547.000|CC1|LIKE THIS.                      
20110129045547.000|20110129045548.000|CC1|>> HIS REPUTATION PRECEDES HIM. 
20110129045548.000|20110129045552.000|CC1|AN INCIDENT AT HIS OLD PRISON   
20110129045552.000|20110129045553.000|CC1|CELLED UP THE PROCESSING.       
20110129045553.000|20110129045554.000|CC1|>> THEY HAVE A LOCK UP FROM THE 
20110129045554.000|20110129045557.000|CC1|PRISON I CAME FROM.             
20110129045557.000|20110129045600.000|CC1|I GOT INTO AN ALTERCATION WITH  
20110129045600.000|20110129045602.000|CC1|SOMEBODY WHO WAS KNOCKED        
20110129045602.000|20110129045602.000|CC1|UNCONSCIOUS.                    
20110129045602.000|20110129045604.000|CC1|THE GUARD SAID I DIDN'T HIT HIM.
20110129045604.000|20110129045607.000|CC1|I TRIED TO PROGRAM IT, BUT
